remarks: Lemma for ~ qqhval2 (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Oct-2017.)
statement:
qqhval2.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.

qqhval2lem $p |- ( ( ( R e. DivRing /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) /\ ( X e. ZZ /\ Y e. ZZ /\ Y =/= 0 ) ) -> ( ( L ` ( numer ` ( X / Y ) ) ) ./ ( L ` ( denom ` ( X / Y ) ) ) ) = ( ( L ` X ) ./ ( L ` Y ) ) ) $.
